stonewakesCross.name: Stone Pickaxe
stonewakesCross.description: A sturdy pickaxe made of stone for beginners. Reliable for basic mining tasks.
stonewakesCross.location: Upon joining the game for the first time.

stonewakesCross.name: Bronze Pickaxe
stonewakesCross.description: Sturdier than stone with improved durability. Mines resources at a moderate speed.

stonewakesCross.name: Iron Pickaxe
stonewakesCross.description: A professional-grade tool that balances speed and strength. The standard choice for serious miners.

stonewakesCross.name: Golden Pickaxe
stonewakesCross.description: Shiny and eye-catching, glimmers with every swing. Slightly fragile, but boosts your luck at finding rare ores.

stonewakesCross.name: Stonewake's Pickaxe
stonewakesCross.description: A heavy tool carved from boulders. Slow to swing, but strong enough to break nearly anything.
stonewakesCross.location: Inner Cave, in the middle of the main inner cave.

stonewakesCross.name: Platinum Pickaxe
stonewakesCross.description: A perfect tool to finish off your chores here, and demolish every rock you see nearby!

stonewakesCross.name: Arcane Pickaxe
stonewakesCross.description: A pickaxe charged with arcane energy, said to draw rare ores straight from the stone.

forgottenKingdom.name: Cobalt Pickaxe
forgottenKingdom.description: Carved from solid cobalt, its rocky blades hit hard and stay strong.

forgottenKingdom.name: Titanium Pickaxe
forgottenKingdom.description: Packed with sharp titanium edges and top spikes, build to tear through tough stone.

forgottenKingdom.name: Uranium Pickaxe
forgottenKingdom.description: A radioactive tool pulsing with unstable energy, striking rocks with explosive force.

forgottenKingdom.name: Mythril Pickaxe
forgottenKingdom.description: Forged from shimmering mythril, incredibly light yet powerful with every swing.

forgottenKingdom.name: Lightite Pickaxe
forgottenKingdom.description: Glowing with pure lightite energy, its radiant blades cut through stone effortlessly.

forgottenKingdom.name: Magma Pickaxe
forgottenKingdom.description: Created by forging volcanic rocks to mine volcanic rocks. Absolute cinema.
forgottenKingdom.location: Beside Amber, in Ashen Passage, next to the entrance of the Volcanic Depths.

forgottenKingdom.name: Demonic Pickaxe
forgottenKingdom.description: A pickaxe fused with demonic power, its crimson eye and glowing veins hunger for the strongest ores.
forgottenKingdom.location: Demonic Pickaxe Alter, in Volcanic Depths

frostspireExpanse.name: Tungsten Pickaxe
frostspireExpanse.description: Extremely dense and heavy, built for relentless mining in frozen lands.

frostspireExpanse.name: Aqua Pickaxe
frostspireExpanse.description: Infused with oceanic essence, flowing smoothly through even the hardest stone.

frostspireExpanse.name: Mist Pickaxe
frostspireExpanse.description: Ethereal and elusive, phases through stone as if it weren't there.

frostspireExpanse.name: Snow Pickaxe
frostspireExpanse.description: A chilled tool forged from eternal frost, designed to slice through frozen earth with ease.

frostspireExpanse.name: Frost Pickaxe
frostspireExpanse.description: Cold to the touch, freezing stone before it shatters apart.

frostspireExpanse.name: Void Pickaxe
frostspireExpanse.description: A heavy, abyssal tool that draws power from the vacuum. Though slow to swing, its luck is unmatched.

frostspireExpanse.name: Prismatic Pickaxe
frostspireExpanse.description: Refracting infinite light, it adapts to strike any material perfectly.
frostspireExpanse.location: Obtain in the Mosasaursit fossilized skeleton

frostspireExpanse.name: Dragon Head Pickaxe
frostspireExpanse.description: Forged from the head of an ancient ice dragon, its power is as legendary as the creature itself.
